task.title: Request a Shift Change
task.shortdesc: Employees can request a shift change from the Team Schedule page. When employees view the page, unassigned shifts are listed under their name. Each activity is listed on a separate row.

image.alt: Employee View of Team Schedule Page

step.cmd: Select the Unassigned Shift row to request the shift.
Complete the Request Schedule Change page. Employees can select from one of three types of changes:

ul.li: Give the shift to a coworker instead of me.
Give away the shift so that it has an "unassigned" status. (This option is delivered off and must be enabled.)
Swap the shift with a coworker for another shift.

info.note: Manager approval may be required based on configuration when creating or editing a scheduling team (Settings > Scheduling Teams > create or edit a team > Self Scheduling section > Allow Employee Request Unassigned Shift option).
